languages.text: {n}Все тело арбитра покрывают кровоподтеки и ранки от шипов палицы. Под покрасневшей кожей мышцы прорисовываются словно каменные. Но Соломон, несмотря на боль, остается стоять прямо, сцепив зубы и давя рвущийся из груди рев.{/n} "Не... останавливайтесь..."
languages.translation_comment:
черный экран (обязательно! не показывать избиение)
выходим из черного экрана, РТ стоит возле Соломона, тот в крови

черный экран (обязательно! не показывать избиение)
выходим из черного экрана, РТ стоит возле Соломона, тот в крови

languages.text: {n}Solomorne's entire body is covered with bruises and wounds from the spikes of the maul, his muscles standing out in stark relief under his reddened skin. But Solomorne, despite the pain, remains upright, gritting his teeth and trying to hold back the roar that bursts from his chest.{/n} "Don't... stop..."
languages.original_text: {n}Все тело арбитра покрывают кровоподтеки и ранки от шипов палицы. Под покрасневшей кожей мышцы прорисовываются словно каменные. Но Соломон, несмотря на боль, остается стоять прямо, сцепив зубы и давя рвущийся из груди рев.{/n} "Не... останавливайтесь..."

languages.text: {n}Le corps de Solomorne est couvert d'hématomes et de blessures infligés par les pointes de la masse, si bien que chacun de ses muscles se dessine nettement sur sa peau rougie. Malgré la douleur, il reste debout et serre les dents en essayant de contenir le cri qui menace de jaillir de sa poitrine.{/n} « Ne vous... arrêtez pas... »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's entire body is covered with bruises and wounds from the spikes of the maul, his muscles standing out in stark relief under his reddened skin. But Solomorne, despite the pain, remains upright, gritting his teeth and trying to hold back the roar that bursts from his chest.{/n} "Don't... stop..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le corps de Solomorne est couvert d'hématomes et de blessures infligés par les pointes de la masse, si bien que chacun de ses muscles se dessine nettement sur sa peau rougie. Malgré la douleur, il reste debout et serre les dents en essayant de contenir le cri qui menace de jaillir de sa poitrine.{/n} « Ne vous... arrêtez pas... »

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンの全身は、モールの棘による打撲や傷で覆われていた。赤くなった肌の下から、浮き上がる筋肉がくっきりと際立っている。しかしソロモーンは、その痛みにもかかわらず歯を食いしばり、胸の奥からあふれ出る咆哮を必死に抑えながら、なおも立ち続けていた。{/n}「やめ…るな…」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's entire body is covered with bruises and wounds from the spikes of the maul, his muscles standing out in stark relief under his reddened skin. But Solomorne, despite the pain, remains upright, gritting his teeth and trying to hold back the roar that bursts from his chest.{/n} "Don't... stop..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンの全身は、モールの棘による打撲や傷で覆われていた。赤くなった肌の下から、浮き上がる筋肉がくっきりと際立っている。しかしソロモーンは、その痛みにもかかわらず歯を食いしばり、胸の奥からあふれ出る咆哮を必死に抑えながら、なおも立ち続けていた。{/n}「やめ…るな…」

languages.text: {n}Todo el cuerpo de Solomorne está cubierto de contusiones y heridas infligidas por las púas de la maza. Sus músculos destacan contra la piel enrojecida. Sin embargo, Solomorne, a pesar del dolor, permanece en pie, apretando los dientes y conteniendo el rugido que sale de su pecho.{/n} «No... se... detenga...».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's entire body is covered with bruises and wounds from the spikes of the maul, his muscles standing out in stark relief under his reddened skin. But Solomorne, despite the pain, remains upright, gritting his teeth and trying to hold back the roar that bursts from his chest.{/n} "Don't... stop..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Todo el cuerpo de Solomorne está cubierto de contusiones y heridas infligidas por las púas de la maza. Sus músculos destacan contra la piel enrojecida. Sin embargo, Solomorne, a pesar del dolor, permanece en pie, apretando los dientes y conteniendo el rugido que sale de su pecho.{/n} «No... se... detenga...».

languages.text: {n}在尖锤的猛击之下，索罗蒙浑身上下都布满了刺伤和淤青。红肿的皮肤之下，他的肌肉显得格外突出。尽管遭受着剧痛折磨，但索罗蒙依然站在原地，咬紧牙关，努力压抑着胸膛中即将迸发而出的吼声。{/n}“不要……停手……”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's entire body is covered with bruises and wounds from the spikes of the maul, his muscles standing out in stark relief under his reddened skin. But Solomorne, despite the pain, remains upright, gritting his teeth and trying to hold back the roar that bursts from his chest.{/n} "Don't... stop..."

traits.locale_text: {n}在尖锤的猛击之下，索罗蒙浑身上下都布满了刺伤和淤青。红肿的皮肤之下，他的肌肉显得格外突出。尽管遭受着剧痛折磨，但索罗蒙依然站在原地，咬紧牙关，努力压抑着胸膛中即将迸发而出的吼声。{/n}“不要……停手……”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne'un tüm vücudu; tokmağın çivilerinin açtığı yaralar ve berelerle kaplanıyor, kasları kızarmış derisinin altında belirginleşiyor. Onca acıya rağmen Solomorne yıkılmıyor, dişlerini sıkıyor ve göğsünden gelen iniltileri bastırmaya çalışıyor.{/n} "Durmayın..."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's entire body is covered with bruises and wounds from the spikes of the maul, his muscles standing out in stark relief under his reddened skin. But Solomorne, despite the pain, remains upright, gritting his teeth and trying to hold back the roar that bursts from his chest.{/n} "Don't... stop..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne'un tüm vücudu, tokmağın çivilerinin açtığı yaralar ve berelerle kaplanıyor, kasları kızarmış derisinin altında belirginleşiyor. Ancak Solomorne, acıya rağmen yıkılmıyor, dişlerini sıkıyor ve göğsünden gelen acı dolu inlemeleri bastırmaya çalışıyor.{/n} "Durmayın..."

languages.text: {n}Die Stacheln des Hammers haben auf Solomornes ganzem Körper Wunden hinterlassen. Alle Muskeln unter seiner geröteten Haut sind angespannt. Aber trotz der Schmerzen steht Solomorne aufrecht, beißt die Zähne zusammen und versucht den Schrei zu unterdrücken, der aus seiner Brust hervorbricht.{/n} "Hört nicht ... auf ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's entire body is covered with bruises and wounds from the spikes of the maul, his muscles standing out in stark relief under his reddened skin. But Solomorne, despite the pain, remains upright, gritting his teeth and trying to hold back the roar that bursts from his chest.{/n} "Don't... stop..."

Aber trotz der Schmerzen steht Solomorne aufrecht, beißt die Zähne zusammen und versucht den Schrei zu unterdrücken, der aus seiner Brust hervorbricht.{/n} "Hört nicht ... auf ..."
